title: Care of the feet
creator_credit: Dudley J. Morton and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents the structural elements of the foot as a weight-supporting structure; how walking is accomplished; depicts causes of structural foot ailments, and suggests remedies; shows other kinds of foot ailments and their diagnosis and treatment.
creator_credit_for_label: Dudley J. Morton and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
